S04n445:1137: prativasataśca baṃdhumatīnagare kumāro yaśaḥ mahāmātyaputraḥ tiṣyaśca |
S04n445:1139: atha bhagavān yathā balavān puruṣaḥ samaṃjite vimiṃjeta vā (prasāritaṃ)
S04n445:1140: bāhuṃ,tathā tatkṣaṇaṃ mārga vṛkṣe antardhāya yatra baṃdhumatīnagare baṃdhu (mato)
S04n445:1141: rājño mṛgadāvavanaṃ tatra prajñapta āsane nyaṣīdat |
S04n445:1149: mahāmātyaputraṃ tiṣyaṃ ca kaccit na jānāti (bhavān)
S04n445:1154: atha udyānapāla ādeśaṃ gṛhītvā yatra tayordvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ sthānaṃ tatrā'gamat,
S04n445:1161: nupūrvyeṇa dharmaṃ prathamaṃ prakāśayāmāsa sukhena udagrāhayituṃ,
S04n445:1165: apakāraṃ saṃkleśasya ūrdhvāśravabhūmyantarāyasya prajñānaṃ vinirgamaṃ atyaṃtaṃ suṃdaraṃ pariśuddham |
S04n445:1166: yadā bhagavān apaśyat tayorubhayoḥ cittacaittaṃ mṛdu udagraṃ prasannaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ saddharmagrahaṇasamarthaṃ,
S04n445:1170: atha rājaputrasya yaśasaḥ tiṣyasya ca mahāmātyaputrasya tasminnevāsane vītamalaṃ birajaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣurudayādi,
S04n445:1171: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastraṃ sukhena gṛhṇīyād rajanam |
S04n445:1172: tasmin kāle bhaumā devā tatrāgāyanta idaṃ vacanaṃ - "
S04n445:1173: vipaśyī tathāgataḥ baṃdhumatīnagare mṛgadāvodyāne pravartayāṃcakāra anuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ,(kenāpi)
S04n445:1174: śramaṇena brāhmaṇena sarvairdevaiḥ mārabrahmaṇā cānyena lokajanena apravartyam |
S04n445:1191: utthāya viśvaśravā nāma ṛṣiduḥkhe jñānaṃ lokato virāgaḥ |
S04n445:1206: sa cet śikṣeta niścinuyāt sarvān dharmān anātmataḥ |
S04n445:1208: necchati yata ājīvalābhaṃ api na yācate yaśaḥ |
S04n445:1217: anuttaraṃ dharmacakramidaṃ buddha eva tadā pravarttayitumalam |
S04n445:1223: tadā rājaputro yaśo mahāmātyaputraḥ tiṣyaścāpaśyatāṃ dharmaṃ,
S04n445:1225: atha tau ūcatuḥ buddhaṃ etad vacanaṃ- "
S04n445:1226: icchāvaḥ tathāgatasya supariśuddhe dharmavinaye brahmacaryaṃ caritum |"
S04n445:1231: tasmin kāle dvau janau alabhatāṃ upasaṃpadam |
S04n445:1232: upasampādya tathāgato nacireṇa prādurakarot nirmāya trīṇi vastūni,
S04n445:1240: mārgaṃ,ādāya cīvaraṃ pariśuddhaṃ pātraṃ ca bhāvayato brahmacaryam |
S04n445:1242: satya eṣa mārgaḥ yata etau cakratuḥ paritatyajatuḥ lokasatkāram |"
S04n445:1243: atha nagarāt caturaśītisahastra manuṣyāḥ jagmuḥ mṛgadāve,
S04n445:1253: prāśaṃsacca naiṣkarmyasya bhāvam atisūkṣmaṃ pariśuddhaṃ anuttaram |
S04n445:1254: yadā bhagavān apaśyat taṃ mahājanaṃ mṛducittaṃ śrāddhaṃ prasannaṃ hṛṣṭatuṣṭaṃ bhavyaṃ saddharmalābhāya |
S04n445:1255: atha taṃ adeśayat dukhaṃ ārya satyaṃ saṃvadamānaḥ saṃvibhajamānaḥ,
S04n445:1263: apaśyat alabhata ca phalaṃ pūrṇaṃ abhayaṃ amṛṣādvāreṇa |
S04n445:1264: atha te'vadan buddhaṃ ca idaṃ vacanaṃ-
S04n445:1265: "icchāmo vayaṃ tathāgatasya supariśuddhe dharmavinaye brahmacaryaṃ caritum | "
S04n445:1271: upasaṃpādya ca tathāgato nacireṇa paryapūrayat bhagavataḥ trivastukāṃ śikṣāṃ,
S04n445:1275: atha te'labhanta anāstravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ avicikitsaprajñāṃ caturāśītisahastraṃ janāḥ |
S04n445:1278: mṛgadāve prāvarttayad anuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ kenāpi śramaṇenabrāhmaṇena devena māreṇa ca aprāvartyam |"
S04n445:1284: yathā yācante śaraṇāt pradīpāt śīghraṃ kāmayanto nirodhasthānam |
S04n445:1285: eva janā,api śīghraṃ upajammuḥ taṃ tathāgatam ||164 ||
S04n445:1286: api caivaṃ ,tasmin kāle baṃdhumatyāṃ abhavat triśatāṣṭacatvāriṃśatsahastraṃ mahābhikṣusaṃghaḥ |
S04n445:1287: yaśo bhikṣustiṣyo bhikṣuśca tasmin saṃghe udgamya ākāśakāyāt niṣkāsayāmāsatuḥ jalaṃ agniṃ (yamakaprātihāryaṃ)
S04n445:1290: tasmin kāle tathāgataḥ tūṣṇīṃ svacitta uvāca- "
S04n445:1291: asmin nagare ca bhavati triśatāṣṭacatvāriṃśatsahastraṃ mahābhikṣusaṃghaḥ,
S04n445:1292: yannu ahaṃ preṣayeyaṃ dvau dvau pratyekaṃ sthānaṃ ṣaṣṭhe saṃvatsare ca pratyāvarttanaṃ nagare teṣāṃ,
S04n445:1294: ājñāsīt ca tathāgatasya cittaṃ sahāṃpatiḥ brahmā (si-tu-brahma-devo)
S04n445:1295: ,atha yathā balavān puruṣaḥ samiṃjiṃta bāhuṃ prasārayet,
S04n445:1296: tathā tasmād devalokāt niṣkramya upākramat ihātra bhagavataḥ puraḥ śirasā vaṃditvā ekamantaṃ atiṣṭhat |
S04n445:1300: yuktaḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃvibhāgaḥ sarvatra cārikā ca,
S04n445:1302: deśayaṃtu te paripūrṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ārakṣiṣyāmi ca tatra chidraṃ na lābhaṃ gaveṣayet |"
S04n445:1303: tadā tathāgato devasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīṃ anvajñāsīt |
S04n445:1304: dṛṣṭvā anujānanaṃ buddhasya sahāṃpatirdevo vaṃditvā buddhasya pādau tat kṣaṇaṃ antardhāya ūrdhvaṃ devalokaṃ pratyāvarttata |
S04n445:1305: na cireṇa tasya gamanāda buddhastān bhikṣūn uvāca-
S04n445:1310: tadā te bhikṣava udgṛhya buddhasya vacanaṃ pātra-cīvaraṃ ādāya vaṃditvā ca buddhaṃ agaman |
S04n445:1312: prāhiṇod buddhaḥ saṃghaṃ vītamohaṃ vītalobhaṃ ca |
S04n445:1313: yathā dṛḍhaḥ suvarṇapakṣaḥ haṃso nipatet riktapuṣkariṇyāḥ ||165 ||
S04n445:1314: atha sahāṃpati deva ekaṃ saṃvatsara vihāya uvāca tān bhikṣūn-
S04n445:1318: yaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ atyayena pratyāvartya uddiśata prātimokṣam |"
S04n445:1319: evaṃ yāvat ṣaḍ varṣaṃ devaḥ punaruvāca vacanam |
S04n445:1320: evaṃ yāvat ṣaṣṭhe saṃvatsare devaḥ punaruvāca vacanam-
S04n445:1323: atha te bhikṣavaḥ pratiśrutya devasya vacanaṃ pātracīvaraṃ ādāya pratyāgaman baṃdhumatīnagare,
S04n445:1326: śirasā vaṃditvā buddhasya pādau ekamantaṃ nyaṣīdan |
S04n445:1332: tasmin kāle tathāgato mahataḥ saṃghasya purata ūrdhva vāte paryaṃkaṃ ābhujya nyaṣīdat adiśacca prātimokṣasūtraṃ kṣāṃtiṃ prathamaṃ adiśad buddho nirvāṇaṃ- na bhavati keśa-śmaśravavahāreṇa muṃḍo'
S04n445:1334: tasmin kāle sahāṃpati rdeva upāgamya buddhasya nātidūre gāthābhirabhāṣat stomanavacanaṃ-
S04n445:1346: tasmin kāle bhagavān uvāca tān bhikṣūn -
S04n445:1348: tadā mama citta idaṃ abhūt- yaḥ ko'
S04n445:1349: pi mama upasthānaṃ ṛcchati sahāṃpatidevaṃ parivarjya,
S04n445:1353: tadā mama citta idaṃ abhūt-icchāmi ahaṃ yāvat deveṣu upari gantum |
S04n445:1354: atha ahaṃ yathā valavān puruṣaḥ sammiṃjitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet (prasāritaṃ vā samiṃjet,tasmineṣa)
S04n445:1355: kāle ito nirgamya prādurabhūtaṃ teṣu deveṣu |
S04n445:1356: atha te sarve devā māṃ draṣṭuṃ āgatāstatra |
S04n445:1357: (āgamya)ca śirasā vaṃditvā ekamantaṃ sthitā ūcuśca idaṃ vacanaṃvayaṃ sarve śrāvakā vipaśyinam tathāgatasya,
S04n445:1367: ahaṃ etaddeśanārthaṃ āgata iha avadaṃśca te buddhāḥ sahetu-pratyayaṃ sādyantaṃ,
S04n445:1370: puruṣo yathā balavān bāhuṃ samiṃjeta prasārayet |
S04n445:1380: prabhā yathā śaradindoḥ prāptaṃ paramamanuttamaṃ ekam ||175 ||
S04n445:1382: śuddhacittāḥ tata āgatya na kleśaṃ prāpnuvaṃti te ||176 ||
S04n445:1388: cittaṃ saṃśodhya gato nirgamya bhava svāminaḥ ||179 ||
S04n445:1409: buddho'vocadidaṃ mahāvadānasūtraṃ atha te bhikṣavaḥ śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitaṃ āttamanasaḥ samanvamodantta ||
